name: Energy Recharge
desc: Energy Recharge (ER%) is a percentage statistic that determines how much Energy a character regains by receiving the same amount of particles.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff73>The mechanics of Energy Recharge are closely connected to the Energy produced by Particles and Orbs.</color> The particles generate a baseline of 1 point of Elemental Energy; Orbs a baseline of 3. Particles can be of one of the 7 elements or can be of clear color. Within the first category, an elemental particle can be of the same element as a character, or of a different one. Also, the character can be on-field or off-field when the particles are caught. These different combinations result in varying energy gained based on the situation, represented in the table below.
As an example: If the element of the particle/orb and character are identical, the amount of energy gained will be 300% of its base; for a clear one, 200%; and if their elements differ, 100%. If the character is on-field, they receive the full 100%; if not, just 60% (or 70% or 80% if there are only 3 or 2 members in the party respectively).

<color=#ffffff>On-field character</color>
<color=#ffffff>Off-field character</color>
<color=#ffffff>Particle /</color> <color=#ffffff>Orb</color>
<color=#ffffff>with a different element</color>
1 pt / 3 pts
0.6 pts / 1.8 pts
<color=#ffffff>Clear particle /</color> <color=#ffffff>orb</color>
2 pts / 6 pts
1.2 pts / 3.6 pts
<color=#ffffff>Particle /</color> <color=#ffffff>Orb</color>
<color=#ffffff>with the same element</color>
3 pts / 9 pts
1.8 pts / 5.4 pts

<color=#ffffff73>In this way, if a clear particle regenerates 2pts of Elemental Energy to the on-field character, with 200% Energy Recharge it will regenerate 4 pts (2 x 100% x 200%); and with 150%, 3 pts (2 x 100% x 150%).</color>

<color=#ffffff73>Not all the Energy regeneration is affected by the Energy Recharge stat, but only the Energy produced by Elemental Skills and Enemy drops. This excludes other mechanisms like the energy generated by the Normal Attacks and by the called "direct" Energy generation (such as the provided by some artifacts' sets, weapons, talents, constellations, etc.).</color>

<color=#ffffff73>Example:</color>
<color=#ffffff73>Xingqiu generates 5 Hydro particles with his Elemental Skill. As he is of the same element (x3) and he collects them on-field (x1), he would obtain 15pts of Energy. However, if his Energy Recharge is 200%, he gains 30 points of Energy. And if it's 265%, 40pts. In this way, with just two uses of his Elemental Skill, he will recover all his Elemental Energy to activate the Elemental Burst again (discarding the calculation of the other particles he may obtain).</color>

<color=#ffffff73>All characters have a base 100% Energy Recharge. This base percentage can normally be increased by the Sands artifact piece whose Main Stat can be Energy Recharge (+51.8%), by the artifacts' substats, by the effects of a set of artifacts, by the substat of a weapon or its passive, and some characters, by their special ascension stat, by a talent or by a constellation.</color>
Weapons with Energy Recharge as substat

customize.name: Favonius Lance
customize.desc: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.

customize.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
customize.desc: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.name: Sacrificial Bow
customize.desc: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.name: Wine and Song
customize.desc: A songbook from the bygone aristocratic era, whose composer has become forgotten. It chronicles the tale of a certain heroic outlaw.

customize.name: Hakushin Ring
customize.desc: A catalyst that carries the memory of the Kitsune Saiguu of ancient times. However, this device is but an impoverished vessel for the full breadth of her thought.

customize.name: Fading Twilight
customize.desc: A precious bow made of platinum, inlaid with an orb that shimmers with the light of eventide.

customize.name: Sapwood Blade
customize.desc: It has taken on the shape of a blade that can cut down the foes of the forest.

customize.name: Forest Regalia
customize.desc: It has taken on the shape of a greatsword that shall cut down the foes of the forest.

customize.name: Ballad of the Boundless Blue
customize.desc: An anthology of exquisite poetry. It contains quite a few poems beloved by Mondstadters, concerning the skies, dandelions, and other such topics.

customize.name: Ultimate Overlord's Mega Magic Sword
customize.desc: A magical sword that can only be wielded by the ultimate overlord who rules the seas. As it has been made with special water-resistant materials, it will not get ruined by water damage even after being immersed. Why, one might even call it invincible!

customize.name: Mountain-Bracing Bolt
customize.desc: This polearm was once jointly forged by the craftsmen in the mines as a sacrifice to the spirits of the mountains.

customize.name: Tamayuratei no Ohanashi
customize.desc: Once upon a time, there was a youkai that roamed Inazuma in the form of a lantern's flame. This must once have been one of its vessels.

customize.name: Skyward Spine
customize.desc: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's firm resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.

customize.name: Skyward Pride
customize.desc: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.

customize.name: Otherworldly Story
customize.desc: A cheap fantasy novel with no value whatsoever. Any claim that it possesses the power of catalysis is also pure fantasy.

customize.name: Favonius Codex
customize.desc: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. It describes the logic and power of elements and matter.

customize.name: Prototype Starglitter
customize.desc: A hooked spear discovered hidden away in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmers along the sharp edge are like stars in the night.

customize.name: Festering Desire
customize.desc: A creepy straight sword that almost seems to yearn for life. It drips with a shriveling venom that could even corrupt a mighty dragon.

customize.name: Katsuragikiri Nagamasa
customize.desc: A blade that was once made in Tatarasuna. Heavy and tough.

customize.name: "The Catch"
customize.desc: In the distant past, this was the beloved spear of a famed Inazuman bandit.

customize.name: Fruit of Fulfillment
customize.desc: It holds the potential to conquer any crisis.

customize.name: End of the Line
customize.desc: This seems to be a now-extinct fish. Its body is sufficiently elastic that a string may be attached to it to let it serve as a bow.

customize.name: Fleuve Cendre Ferryman
customize.desc: A handy length of abandoned copper pipe that was once used as a weapon. It was famous — or infamous, depending — in some circles.

customize.name: Etherlight Spindlelute
customize.desc: A lute whose golden strings are as radiant as sunlight. It appears to be a relic from the Seelie of old.

customize.name: Skyrider Sword
customize.desc: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword...

customize.name: Skyward Blade
customize.desc: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. The blessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.

customize.name: Elegy for the End
customize.desc: A bow as lovely as any bard's lyre, its arrows pierce the heart like a lamenting sigh.

customize.name: Engulfing Lightning
customize.desc: A naginata used to "cut grass." Any army that stands before this weapon will probably be likewise cut down...

customize.name: Favonius Sword
customize.desc: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!

customize.name: Favonius Greatsword
customize.desc: A heavy ceremonial sword of the Knights of Favonius. It channels elemental power easily and is highly destructive.

customize.name: Favonius Warbow
customize.desc: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archers can unleash its full potential.

customize.name: Sacrificial Sword
customize.desc: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.

customize.name: Waveriding Whirl
customize.desc: A boomerang made from the fangs of a giant sea serpent. It was a rare weapon indeed that the giant Tupac would call "trusty."

customize.name: Master Key
customize.desc: A heavy greatsword with a razor-sharp blade. Power is a key that can open almost any lock.

customize.name: Serenity's Call
customize.desc: A longsword forged from metal that makes a mournful sound when swung.

customize.name: Snare Hook
customize.desc: The stave of this bow is comprised of metal alloy and yet remains surprisingly light. Even when faced with thick, heavy snares, the arrows it fires can pass through unhindered.

customize.name: Oathsworn Eye
customize.desc: A national treasure of Byakuyakoku stored in the Dainichi Mikoshi. With the coming of the Serpent God, this item was used to notarize great oaths and wishes.

customize.text: Increases Energy Recharge by <color=#37ffff>24%/30%/36%/42%/48%</color> for 10s after using an Elemental Skill.

customize.name: Engulfing Lightning
customize.desc: A naginata used to "cut grass." Any army that stands before this weapon will probably be likewise cut down...

customize.text: Gain <color=#37ffff>30%/35%/40%/45%/50%</color> Energy Recharge for 12s after using an Elemental Burst.

customize.name: Xiphos' Moonlight
customize.desc: This ancient double-edged sword glimmers with moonlight. It is said that a now-silent Jinni dwells within it.

customize.text: Every 10s the equipping character will gain <color=#37ffff>0.036%/0.045%/0.054%/0.063%/0.072%</color> Energy Recharge for each point of Elemental Mastery they possess for 12s, with nearby party members gaining 30% of this buff for the same duration.

customize.name: Fleuve Cendre Ferryman
customize.desc: A handy length of abandoned copper pipe that was once used as a weapon. It was famous — or infamous, depending — in some circles.

customize.text: Increases Energy Recharge by <color=#37ffff>16%/20%/24%/28%/32%</color> for 5s after using an Elemental Skill.

customize.name: Bennett
customize.desc: A good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

customize.name: Kaeya
customize.desc: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

customize.name: Yun Jin
customize.desc: A renowned Liyue opera singer who is skilled in both playwriting and singing. Her style is one-of-a-kind, exquisite and delicate, much like the person herself.

customize.name: Mona
customize.desc: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

customize.name: Venti
customize.desc: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

customize.name: Raiden Shogun
customize.desc: Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, who promised the people of Inazuma an unchanging Eternity.

customize.name: Razor
customize.desc: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension Talent</color>
When Razor's Energy is below 50%, increases Energy Recharge by 30%.
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Skill</color>
Upon striking an opponent with his Thunder Wolf Claw, Razor will gain an Electro sigil, which increases his Energy Recharge +20% for each one (max.3).

customize.name: Traveler (Electro)
customize.desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Elemental Skill</color>
Increases Energy Recharge +20% during the Abundance Amulet's duration.
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension Talent</color>
Increases the Energy Recharge effect granted by <color=#ffd780>Lightning Blade</color> 's Abundance Amulet by 10% of the Traveler's Energy Recharge.

customize.name: Keqing
customize.desc: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis's unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Ascension Talent</color>
When casting <color=#ffd780>Starward Sword</color> , Keqing's Energy Recharge is increased by 15%. This effect lasts for 8s.

customize.name: Traveler (Anemo)
customize.desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

customize.name: Bennett
customize.desc: A good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>2nd Constellation</color>
When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

customize.name: Xiao
customize.desc: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>2nd Constellation</color>
When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

customize.name: Collei
customize.desc: A trainee ranger active in Avidya Forest. Behind her enthusiastic words and actions hides a slightly introverted personality.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>1st Constellation</color>
When in the party and not on the field, Collei's Energy Recharge is increased by 20%.

customize.name: Dori
customize.desc: An elusive merchant who has a fondness for glittering Mora.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>4th Constellation</color>
When the Energy of the character connected to the <color=#ffe699>Jinni</color> is less than 50%, will gain 30% Energy Recharge.

value.name: Energy
value.desc: Elemental Energy is a resource that allows each character to activate their Elemental Burst after acquiring a specific amount.

galleryCharacter.key: Energy Recharge on the character stats screen

imgDesc.text: Every character has 100% as their base Energy Recharge percentage.

galleryCharacter.key: Energy Recharge as special ascension stat

imgDesc.text: The special ascension stat of some characters is Energy Recharge, increasing it with the higher ascensions.
Energy Recharge has a direct connection with the particles and orbs.
